name: tunebank-node
description: web server for ABC notation music

scripts.bundle-server: cd server && spago bundle --bundle-type app --platform node --outfile tunebank.js
scripts.bundle-migration: cd migration && spago bundle --bundle-type app --platform node --outfile migrate.js
scripts.bundle-importation: cd importation && spago bundle --bundle-type app --platform node --outfile import.js
